main.head: Silvio Berlusconi condemns tax fraud sentence - video
main.p: This article is more than 11 years old

An excerpt from an impassioned video message from former Italian prime minister Silvio Berlusconi after his sentencing by the country's supreme court on Thursday. The court upheld a lower court's conviction for the fraudulent purchase of broadcasting rights by Berlusconi's Mediaset television empire
